T02D1387:285b-1: sha dam ga yo ga / bod skad du //
T02D1387:285b-2: sbyor ba yan lag drug pa //

T02D1387:286a-29: dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' gang la sprul pa mig 'byed la //
T02D1387:286b-0: thugs rje chen po rgyas pas brlan pa bsam @286b pa'i brten za las //

T02D1387:287a-4: ba rnyan nam mig yor rmi lam dang mtshungs pa

T02D1387:287a-32: bsgom ba'i thabs rnams kyis ni mi mthong ste //

T02D1387:298b-25: zhes pa glog ltar snang ba'o //

T02D1387:298b-42: khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba //

T02D1387:298b-46: dngos po med la sgom pa med //

T02D1387:299a-5: la sgom pa ni so sor spyad pa ste de

T02D1387:299a-7: ces so // sgom pa sgom pa nyid ma yin //
T02D1387:299a-8: zhes pa 'dir so sor sdud pa sgom pa'i dngos

T02D1387:299a-15: / rnam par ma brtags pa 'das pa dang ma
T02D1387:299a-16: 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i dngos po mthong

T02D1387:299a-27: rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa

T02D1387:299a-31: phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa de ni
T02D1387:299a-32: nam mkha' la rnal 'byor du byed pa'o //
T02D1387:299a-33: koo shi ka bla gab med pa la rnal 'byor
T02D1387:299a-34: du byed par sems pa de ni gang shes rab
T02D1387:299a-35: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya
T02D1387:299a-36: bar sems pa'o zhes sprin med pa'i nam mkha' la
T02D1387:299a-37: phyag rgya chen po bsgom pa pra phab dang mtshungs
T02D1387:299a-38: par bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1387:299a-39: de ltar so sor sdud pa dang bsam gtan gyis bsnyen pa'i yan lag brjod do //
T02D1387:299a-40: de nas bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi ming gis dgongs pa'i skad gzhan gyis rlung gsungs so //

T02D1387:299a-42: de skad du 'dus pa phyi mar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1387:299a-43: rin chen lnga yi rang bzhin dbugs //
T02D1387:299a-44: sangs rgyas lnga yis byin rlabs pa //
T02D1387:299b-0: gong bu'i @299b gzugs kyis phyung nas ni //
T02D1387:299b-1: sna yi rtse mor rnam bsgom bya //
T02D1387:299b-3: 'dir rin chen lnga'i sgra yis ra sa n'a'i dkyil
T02D1387:299b-4: 'khor lnga yis chos can sa la sogs pa'i khams
T02D1387:299b-5: rnams so // de'i rang bzhin gyi dbugs ni rin

T02D1387:299b-7: rnams so // // de bzhin du sangs rgyas lnga

T02D1387:299b-10: rnams so // // te / de rnams kyis byin

T02D1387:299b-14: cig shos kyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi srog gi rlung
T02D1387:299b-15: dbu ma aa wa dh'u t'ir gcig pa nyid do

T02D1387:299b-18: sna yi rtse mor rnam bsgom bya //

T02D1387:299b-23: rnam bsgom bya ni lte ba dang lte ba'i dbus
T02D1387:299b-24: su ste padma'i 'dab ma la ni ma yin no

T02D1387:299b-26: kyis srog 'gog pa de nyid kyis de'i 'dzin par
T02D1387:299b-27: // brjod do // de ltar yan lag gnyis kyis

T02D1387:299b-30: nye ba'i bsgrub pa de nyid rdo rje'i bzlas pa zhes brjod par bya ste /
T02D1387:299b-31: dbu ma dbyer med pa'i yan lag gis bzlas par
T02D1387:299b-32: bya'o zhes pa srog g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i rtsal
T02D1387:299b-34: gtsug tor gzugs brnyan mthong bas na //

T02D1387:299b-37: srog rtsol ba dang 'dzin pa ste nye ba'i bsgrub pa brjod do //
T02D1387:299b-39: bsgrub pa la ni lha yi gzugs //
T02D1387:299b-40: zhes pa 'dir 'dzin pa'i stobs kyis lte bar gnas

T02D1387:299b-42: / sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba pra phab

T02D1387:299b-44: sprin mtha' yas pa spro bar byed pa 'od zer
T02D1387:299b-45: gyis dkyil 'khor du rnam par gsal ba ni rjes
T02D1387:300a-2: 'dzin pa'i mthar gtum mo'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1387:300a-3: der de ltar ye shes kyi me lces phung po
T02D1387:300a-4: dang khams la sogs pa rnams bsregs pa gcig tu
T02D1387:300a-6: g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i rtsar son pa rnam par
T02D1387:300a-7: shes pa la sogs pa dang sa la sogs pa'i
T02D1387:300a-8: dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin rnams dpral bar zla ba'i
T02D1387:300a-9: dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa rnams so //
T02D1387:300a-10: de nas gtum mo'i ye shes kyi me lces zla
T02D1387:300a-11: ba zhu bar gyur pa ni de byang chub sems
T02D1387:300a-12: thig le'i gzugs kyis 'og tu song ba ni mgrin
T02D1387:300a-15: gsang ba'i padmar dga' ba dang /
T02D1387:300a-17: khyad dga'i dga' ba'i rang bzhin dang /

T02D1387:300a-20: so zhes pa'o // yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang ;
T02D1387:300a-23: mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i rang bzhin gyis so zhes so //
T02D1387:300a-24: de ltar cha bcu drug gang ba nor bu'i nang
T02D1387:300a-25: ji srid par son pa gang gi tshe bsgoms pa'i
T02D1387:300a-27: 'dzag pa'i bde ba dang 'dra ba'o zhes pa ni
T02D1387:300a-28: dpe tsam ste rang gi ngo bos ni dbang po
T02D1387:300a-29: gnyis las skyes pa'i bde bas mchog tu mi 'gyur
T02D1387:300a-30: ba'i bde ba'i gnas skabs kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i
T02D1387:300a-31: dga' ba'i ngo bo can gyis bye ba stong gi
T02D1387:300a-33: gnas skabs de ni byis pa'i rnal 'byor pas ci
T02D1387:300a-34: yang rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa'o
T02D1387:300a-35: // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stong nyid byang chub ces brjod de /
T02D1387:300a-36: 'jig rten la grags pa'i med pa nyid kyi rjes su 'gro ba ni ma yin no //

T02D1387:300a-38: bsam gtan dang bas rnal 'byor ba rnams sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D1387:300a-39: bsod nams mchog tu dag byed sdig pa 'jig byed pa /

T02D1387:300a-41: slar yang de nyid du 'dir rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med ni rgyu ste /

T02D1387:300b-2: ba las rnam pa thams cad pa rtog pa dang
T02D1387:300b-3: bral zhing ma 'khrul pa'i mngon sum gyis mthong ba'i
T02D1387:300b-4: phyir zhes pa'o // rnam pa med ni rdul phra
T02D1387:300b-5: rab kyi chos nyid las ma 'das pa ste rtog
T02D1387:300b-6: pa dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1387:300b-7: btsums shing ma btsums pa'i mig gis rtogs par bya ba gang yin pa de'i phyir gzugs ma yin //
T02D1387:300b-8: gzugs las gzhan pa yang ma yin /
T02D1387:300b-9: mig gis dang mig med par rtogs par bya ba yang ma yin no //
T02D1387:300b-10: de ltar rnam pa thams cad rnam pa med ni rgyu ste /
T02D1387:300b-11: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po
T02D1387:300b-12: stong pa nyid rnam pa thams cad mchog dang ldan
T02D1387:300b-13: pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa'o //

T02D1387:300b-15: rdul phra rab kyi chos nyid las 'das pa'o //
T02D1387:300b-16: de snying po zhabs kyis gsungs pa 'di lta ste /

T02D1387:300b-18: dngos po bsgom bya zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1387:300b-19: 'dir nam mkha' la dngos po bsgom bya ni rmi lam lta bu ste /
T02D1387:300b-20: rdul phra rab kyi chos nyid las 'das pa'o //
T02D1387:300b-21: de yongs shes pa dngos po med pa bsgom par bya ste /

T02D1387:300b-23: rtog pa dang bral zhing ma 'khrul ba ni mngon

T02D1387:300b-27: drug po rnams kyis stong ba nyid ni sgom pa

T02D1387:300b-30: gsungs // rnams kyang ngo // so sor sdud pas
T02D1387:300b-31: rnal 'byor pa ni nam mkha'i mthil du son pa
T02D1387:300b-32: dus gsum gzugs rnams mthong bar byed //

T02D1387:300b-34: byed de phyi rol dngos po rnams ni rnam par

T02D1387:300b-36: nyi ma dang bral mun pa can du srog rlung
T02D1387:300b-38: dang ni 'jug pas dman par byed de 'dzin pa'i
T02D1387:301a-2: rjes su dran pas mkha' la ri bong can bzhin rang gi gzugs las 'od zer chen par rgyu //
T02D1387:301a-3: ting nge 'dzin gyis khu ba rdo rje las ni
T02D1387:301a-4: mgo bor bgrod byed dri med bde bas rab gang
T02D1387:301a-5: ba'o // nam mkha'i lta bas gti mug mtha' nyid
T02D1387:301a-6: du ni byed par 'gyur te stong pa nyid ni
T02D1387:301a-7: ba'o // mthong bas so // nang gi lta bas
T02D1387:301a-8: 'dod chags mtha' nyid du ni byed par 'gyur te
T02D1387:301a-9: srog gi rlung ni 'gags pa na'o //

T02D1387:301a-11: byed bar 'gyur te khu ba dri med bde ba

T02D1387:301a-14: las // dbyangs las so // srog dang rtsol ba

T02D1387:301a-18: khu ba steng du son dang 'og tu'ang rdul gyis gzhom du med pa'i dbyangs las ni //
T02D1387:301a-19: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje dri ma rnam bral gang gis sangs rgyas ston pa po //

T02D1387:301a-26: pa'o // rab tu 'gyur // sangs rgyas rnams kyis
T02D1387:301a-27: thams cad gzigs shing dri ma gsum dang rnam bral
T02D1387:301a-28: ye shes spyan ni lnga pa'o //
T02D1387:301a-29: 'dzag med dga' ba khu ba rdo rje yang ste

T02D1387:301a-38: / gang gi spyi bo'i rgyud du khu ba dri
T02D1387:301a-39: ma med pa'i bde ba 'dzin pa 'di ni pradzny'a

T02D1387:301b-2: rje dang bcas mgo bor drug ba rdo rje sems

T02D1387:301b-19: // tu 'gyur // de ltar ae wam dang ni

T02D1387:301b-24: mi shes gcod pa gri gug mchog gi rigs drug rnams te 'di rnams kyis ni bskyod pa gang //

T02D1387:301b-28: gang du 'khor ba'i 'du shes mthar byed nyid gyur de ni rdo rje'i 'du shes chen po'o //

T02D1387:302a-2: gang du nga rgyal mtha' dag nyams pa nyid gyur m'a ma k'i ste de ni chu nyid do //

T02D1387:302a-4: gang du phrag dog mtha' dag nyams pa nyid gyur de ni sgrol ma'o de ni rlung yang ngo //
T02D1387:302a-5: gang du zhe sdang mtha' dag nyams pa nyid gyur rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste mkha' //
T02D1387:302a-6: gang du ser sna thams cad nyams pa nyid gyur
T02D1387:302a-7: de ni sna tshogs yum ste de ni 'gyur med
T02D1387:302a-8: do // mthong ngam ma mthong gzugs ni yid kyi
T02D1387:302a-9: nam mkha' la yang lta bar byed pa gang de
T02D1387:302a-10: mig / ring nas sgra ni rab tu gsal ba
T02D1387:302a-11: bzhin du thos 'di rgyal ba'i rna ba chen po'o
T02D1387:302a-12: do // // mchog gi bde ba byed pa'i dri
T02D1387:302a-13: kun 'dzin pa de ni khyab bdag gi yang sna
T02D1387:302a-14: do // // bzang po // rang gi zla ba
T02D1387:302a-15: bdud rtsi bde ba ster ba'ang rtag tu myong bar
T02D1387:302a-17: rdo rje'i reg bya kun nas 'dzin pa gang de rtag tu rdo rje lus kyi dbang po ste //
T02D1387:302a-18: shes rab thabs dang rab tu 'grogs las yid ni mnyam la 'jug gang de ni 'di yi chos //
T02D1387:302a-19: dbye ba drug gis phye ba'i yul dang yul can 'di rnams byang chub sems dpa' btsun mor bcas //
T02D1387:302a-20: gzugs brnyan la ni gzugs sogs 'di rnams rgyal ba mchog gi yul rnams rnam drug kun nas ni //
T02D1387:302a-21: dang zhing ma skyes ma 'gags mchog gi bde byed rnyog med ye shes kyis ni rtogs bya ste //
T02D1387:302a-22: gzhan gyis gzung bya khams gsum du ni mtha' dag 'gro ba'i dbang po'i sgo yis rtogs bya min //
T02D1387:302a-23: sangs rgyas rnams kyi'ang rtogs bya min pa dpag med
T02D1387:302a-24: yon tan dang ldan sangs rgyas sbrul pa sgyu ma
T02D1387:302a-25: ni // srid gsum gnas su bdag nyid ston par
T02D1387:302a-26: byed de brgya byin dra ba nyid bzhin nyid du'o
T02D1387:302a-27: ni // // sna tshogs dngos rnams kyis phye rgyal
T02D1387:302a-28: ba dang bcas lha rnams kyi rang sems la rab
T02D1387:302a-29: ni // // zhugs pa // 'di ni ma skyes
T02D1387:302a-30: chos te chu la nam mkha' bzhin du 'di la
T02D1387:302a-32: / khro bo sangs rgyas lha mo dang bcas nges
T02D1387:302a-33: par ro yi rdo rje rnams dang sa gzhi'i snying
T02D1387:302a-34: po sogs // rab tu dga' ba'i thugs can rnams
T02D1387:302a-35: ni rnal 'byor pa la 'grub pa'i dus su mkha'
T02D1387:302a-37: de yi 'dod pa'i dngos grub ri bong can gyi
T02D1387:302b-0: zhag gi tho rangs dang ni mtshan @302b mo'i phyed
T02D1387:302b-1: la 'gyur // rin po che'am me tog char pa
T02D1387:302b-2: mchog gyur dus kyi sbyor bas sa yi steng du
T02D1387:302b-3: la 'gyur // 'gyur / dang po'i sangs rgyas las
T02D1387:302b-4: 'dir rdo rje'i tshig 'di rab tu gsal bar mdor
T02D1387:302b-5: bstan pa dang rgyas par bshad pa rnams kyis bcom
T02D1387:302b-6: ldan 'das kyis gsal bar mdzad do //
T02D1387:302b-7: 'di nyid kyi sgrub thabs phyag rgya chen po'i sgom
T02D1387:302b-8: pa du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma can gyi
T02D1387:302b-10: stong par rtse gcig yid byas nas //

T02D1387:302b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung 'di'i phyir mchog gi dang
T02D1387:302b-14: po'i sangs rgyas su rdo rje'i tshig phyag rgya chen
T02D1387:302b-15: po sgom pa'i lam du ba la sogs pa rab
T02D1387:302b-17: bla ma brgyud pa'i rim pas 'ongs pa ste /
T02D1387:302b-18: bla ma'i bka' yis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin no zhes pa'o //
T02D1387:302b-19: lam 'di'i rab tu gsal ba la nyin dang mtshan mor yid ches pa yod de /
T02D1387:302b-20: nyin zhag gcig ni brtag par bya //
T02D1387:302b-21: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1387:302b-22: 'dir du ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma bor nas
T02D1387:302b-23: gzhan sngags la sogs pa'i sgrub thabs kyis rnal 'byor
T02D1387:302b-24: pas brtag par bya ba ma yin no //
T02D1387:302b-25: mtshan ma yang rnam pa gsum ste //
T02D1387:302b-28: dang po'i mtshan ma ni du ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1387:302b-29: lam rnal 'byor yan lag drug gi gzugs brnyan grub
T02D1387:302b-30: par mi 'gyur ba'i skad cig thob pa'o //
T02D1387:302b-31: mtshan ma bar ma ni mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i
T02D1387:302b-32: skad cig brgya phrag bco brgyad rnams kyis sa dang
T02D1387:302b-34: mngon par shes pa lnga dang //
T02D1387:302b-35: ma mthang ba'i don yang dag par mthong ba dang /
T02D1387:302b-39: rdo rje 'chang nyid de mchog ti mi 'gyur ba'i
T02D1387:302b-40: skad cig drug brgyas lhag pa'i stong phrag nyi shu
T02D1387:302b-41: rtsa gcig rnams kyis sa bcu gnyis thob pa phyag
T02D1387:302b-42: rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob po zhes pa'o //
T02D1387:302b-43: rdo rje'i tshig la sogs pa mtshan ma sngon ma

T02D1387:303a-0: dpal ldan mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas la sogs par rgyud sna tshogs pa @303a * //
T02D1387:303a-1: rnams kyi rnal 'byor yan lag drug rdzogs so /
T02D1387:303a-3: // /'di ni mkhas pa dpe med pas bsrungs pa'i zhabs kyis mdzad pa'o //
T02D1387:303a-4: la stod ding ri'i glang 'khor mkhan pa khrod du
T02D1387:303a-5: rgya gar shar phyogs dza gad ta la'i pandi ta

T02D1387:303a-7: gnyal gyi lo ts'a ba mi mnyam bzang pos bsgyur ba'o /
T02D1387:303a-9: // / slar yang lo ts'a ba'i ming tsam 'dzin pa
